pages.text: The $(item)Acceleration Rune$() increases the rate of a couple operations. While normally the operations of the $(l:neovitae:altar/blood_rune/charging_rune)Charging Rune$(/l) and $(l:neovitae:altar/blood_rune/dislocation_rune)Displacement Rune$(/l) occur every 20 ticks, one tick of the delay is removed per rune, down to a minimum of 1 operation per tick.

With some $(item)Netherite Scrap$() and some $(item)Intricate Hellforged Parts$() looted from the $(l:neovitae:dungeons/endless_realm)Demon Realm$(), you can double the power of your $(item)Acceleration Rune$(), removing two ticks per rune instead of one, freeing up other slots around your altar.
If you change your mind, you can undo the recipe in the ARC.
